MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:20am due to safety concerns with our equipment on Burnblea Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30am on Wednesday, 25 November 2020
